alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 5:45PM CDT until July 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kansas, including the following county, Lyon. * WHEN...Until 615 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in Emporia. Between 1.5 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Emporia.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
